content.label: Skirmish mode where you just 1v1 2v2 and 3v3 and there are different species you can play as or a multiplayer where you can play online with friends and survival mode you earn supply’s my killing the enemy

I think it very good so far and the new planet helped add a lot more new content. But I think there needs to be a bit more unit flexibility and I haven't been able to find an enemy or tower gallery. This might be because my tablet is old but I keep experiencing crashes on the third world mission two. Also needs more content.
I’m really like these games. But this really disappoints me. I would save my money and wait to now one.
For 99 cents this is an awesome deal! Best game out there for the price!
I’ve bought every game from this developer and some small in app purchases each time. Well worth it! Love this game as much as the others.

I feel like iron marines is trying to double dip in having a premium price tag at the same time of having all the trappings of a free to play game (consumable items, so many premium characters, etc.)

Game itself is good, but hard for me to enjoy when I feel nickle and dimed every time I look at the unlock menus.

Been an IronHide fan since the beginning, this game is absolutely my favorite of the bunch. It’s a mix of RTS and Tower Defense, it doesn’t get any better than this in quality. Please IronHide make more like this, my favorite game on the Market. Keep up the incredible work, this is a love letter to Sci-Fi fans .... ✌️

title.label: Either it’s free to play, or all features are open

content.label: If your interested in paying $4.99 for an app that will operate like a free to play game then this is great.

title.label: Great follow-up to Kingdom Rush series

content.label:
I was a big fan of the original Kingdom Rush but was a bit disappointed with the sequels as they weren’t much different. I hoped the development team would try something new, and here it is. Initially I was disappointed as the early levels seemed easy and didn’t require much thought. Level 7 changed things for me. It was much tougher and I had to start thinking about strategy, which then got me going back to the earlier levels to replay and and get some upgrades. I really enjoy the game now, and I’m taking my time playing all the extra levels and upgrading different heroes.

There’s a large amount of content and a lot of replayability in order to get upgrades and get achievements. Great game - thanks again Ironhide!
I’m playing— but how do I find out what everything does?? There’s no documentation on weapons or upgrades.
It reminds me a little of playing old-school red alert! Just awesome
The game is very entertaining I’ve wasted half the morning just playing it.
Bottom Line Needs another planet more updates
You guys always make the best games...... No In App Purchases..... One time buy for the best mobile device games.
This game has a unfinished story and needs a last planet. :(
It’s a good game, hope in future there is further customizing for units and more

Great Game good challenge but why can’t I cash in all of my upgrade points for coins to buy things like freeze bombs and  mines? They just keep building up and there’s no way to use them after all the upgrades are purchased.

Maybe there should be an option where you get 1/3 coins for 1 upgrade point, once all the upgrades are purchased.

So far I like all of the ironhide games! Keep upgrading & making them!

I have not tried the latest Kingdom Rush but it’s on the radar.

Thanks!

Dan
It’s an amazing underrated game
I looooooost

title.label: Hoped it would be more like kingdom rush

content.label: Waste of money

Developer also does not respond when you reach out for help or questions about this.

I recently reinstalled the app on the same device as before.  I had purchased nearly all of the extra heroes offered as in-app purchases early after first buying the game.  Now reinstalled and connected to the same account and Game Center, there is no restore purchases option and no response from developer.  Sad, I am a huge Iron Hide fan and have bought almost every product they have published.  Leaves a bad taste in my mouth to think about how many people have just paid them twice for things.  A form of theft really.

title.label: Love it!  When’s the update coming out?

content.label: Need more missions!

I’ve been a fan of Kingdom Rush since the early days. It’s always nice to see a game that isn’t a slave to the 3D “raytraced” world of graphics cards. This is a nice change of pace from the usual tower defense games you are used to seeing. It’s quite challenging and yet refreshing at the same time. The references in this game and their Kingdom Rush games also never disappoint. This is one of the few iPhone games that won’t ever be deleted. 

P.S. Have you guys ever introduced yourselves to the gaming community ?
What a breath of fresh air! Familiar but so much different .. reminds me of AOE campaign

title.label: I love all of your games!!! But help!!!

content.label: I’ve gotten every single game from you guys I am a huge fan on the franchise but I’m on the third planet and I’ve got like 2/3 levels left and it loads the beginning on the level   Then as soon as I move my two sniper teams and my flame mech and hero it crashes, I can continue finishing the minis and all I till it’s fixed but please help me I love finishing all of your games !!! 100% love all of the Easter eggs

title.label: One of the best games I have ever played

content.label: I have played all of the iron hide games. Even though KingdomRush is a great game I think this is the best game they have made. It is better than all the games there comparing it to like Starcraft and Warcraft because it is unique.Also I wish they turned it into a multiplayer game.It would be nice with more worlds.Even so this is one of the best games I have ever played in my life.
The crashing problem on the 3rd world needs to be fixed.  Can’t move forward

The last update has rendered the game completely unplayable. Ive already played through the game with increasing difficulty. I own every single IronHide studios game, probably the best developer in the mobile gaming world. I will adjust the review if this issue can be fixed, otherwise a completely unplayable game is a waste of my money.
Brilliantly made!

title.label: Would love to see continued content.

content.label: It's a very enjoyable game with pleasing graphics. Really hope the developers continue with updates. An additional world would be incredible.

title.label: One of the best mobile games ever.

content.label:
I’ll preface this by saying I’m a big ironhide fan. The kingdom rush title is probably my favorite tower defense series. But what they have done here is a step beyond. I’m not sure what to make of the critiques that it is too hard. Reports that you can’t get past a couple levels in casual mode without serious grinding don’t reflect my experience. I started on normal and didn’t wipe but a few times on the first planet. And that was mostly the last level while I figured out what to attack the boss with.

The are varied levels, from rescue missions to base builds, that require a little strategy to be sure, but that’s why it’s a great game. The talent trees work well and the combat units complement each other. The alien units have a particularly beautiful synergy that rates among any I’ve ever played.

Frankly, I would love to see this universe expanded as they’ve done a fabulous job with their story telling and world building. Five stars from me.

Please add a skirmish mode (endless) to this amazing game I feel so disappointed that after completing everything and there’s nothing else to do I still want to play more will there be a update in the near future???
Play it.

title.label: Great, but levels take too long and heroes cost too much.

content.label: This is another great game in the tradition of Kingdom Rush. I'm finding however that the levels are more difficult than you’d expect on casual and take too long once you get to around level four or five. The levels could have been broken into multiple shorter more enjoyable levels. The difficulty also increases at an over accelerated rate. The final frustration is the high cost of heroes. Each hero costs at least twice as much as it should.
About halfway through it right now. Very enjoyable and playable
I absolutely loved Kingdom Rush, have played them all. I just don’t like this at all. No tutorial to speak of, just don’t enjoy it at all. Wish I hadn’t bought it.

Okay. I am stuck on the third level and drag all my forces to the main base but after it does stay survive for 1 minute and 10 seconds I am defeated with my base completely unharmed it is so frustrating

title.label: Good challenge not to easy or too hard

content.label:
I am a big fan of strategy games. I also know a game is fun if the challenge is big. That being said, I rate this game five stars due to its vast amount of variety. What I mean by this is even without spending a single penny on this game you are still offered a ton of hero’s and units to make a working strategy. Just like kingdom rush this game has a great sense of challenge and strategy, all though I do find this game a bit harder.

To address those people who say this game is impossible without spending money. I say to you, that when I say this game is a bit harder I mean that it took 2-4 tries to beat a level on impossible. Normally in kingdom rush I can do it first try or second if I’m unlucky. My point is that you scrubs who say this game is hard, you are simply incompetent, a strategy game, requires you to actually think and this game does a perfect job at that. If you lose it’s simply a mistake in your strategy. Improvise and retry.

I say that this game is not too hard or too easy for a reason. It’s not too easy in the sense that it doesn’t require effort to win and it’s not too hard  due to it actually being beatable within 1-3 try’s. Hard for me would be taking about 6-10+ try’s to beat a level. In summary this game a good challenge that is easily beatable if you use your units and hero’s correctly.
Great game😁
Comment: the fell are like the flood in halo.

title.label: Best game I have ever played hands down

content.label: It doesn’t really matter what type of game you like, this will no doubt blow you away. I personally had the best experience using blue dragon although you do have to spend a little extra. Also you can mass select your units by double tapping, a fact not many people gather. All in all this is the best game I have ever played. It just needs a couple new planets to conquer. Just get this game

The game is ok. If you’re looking for something similar to the kingdom rush series, you won’t find it here. The biggest drawback of this game is the maneuvering of troops and your hero around the battlefield it seems like it’s a constant struggle to keep them close enough to the battle but far enough away from artillery.
Really like how it puts strategy and a mobile game together and then you get this master piece, solid 5 stars

I love, love, love! This game, the only thing I could want? Is a better zoom option , because you know ! I wanna see them up closer as they fight, that’s literally the only thing lacking , other then that ? I LOVE THIS GAME! Zoom in

title.label: Great game, once you understand the controls

content.label: But there needs to be more instructions
cool for meeeeeeee

This game is well built and very fun. Unit movement and strategy is perfect. The only thing I see missing is a skirmish mode and base building that enables play after the story mode. Multiplayer would be nice but not necessary. Well done!
